doc:
Vera Michelena https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vera_Michelena 0 Vera Michelena (June 16, 1885 – August 28, 1961) was an American actress, contralto prima donna and dancer who appeared in light opera, musical comedy, vaudeville and silent film. She was perhaps best remembered for her starring rôles in the musicals The Princess Chic, Flo Flo and The Waltz Dream, her rendition of the vampire dance in the musical Take It From Me and as a Ziegfeld Follies performer. Vera_Michelena ( June_16 , 1885 – August_28_,_1961 ) was an_American_actress , contralto_prima_donna and dancer who appeared in light_opera , musical_comedy , vaudeville and silent_film . She was_perhaps_best_remembered for her_starring_rôles in the_musicals The_Princess_Chic , Flo_Flo and The_Waltz_Dream , her_rendition of the_vampire_dance in the_musical Take It From Me and as a_Ziegfeld_Follies_performer .
